~Dash~.Effect: You can move 5 more meters this turn.
~Dash~.Name: ~Dash~

~Defend~.Effect: Until the start of your next turn, your Defense and all Combat Checks increase by +2.
~Defend~.Name: ~Defend~

~Disengage~.Effect: You don't trigger attacks of oportunity this turn.
~Disengage~.Name: ~Disengage~

~Improvised Attack~.Effect:
You can use small, medium or large non-weapon objects from around and attack with them.
Small Objects - Half-Action, 1d10 + Dexterity damage, thrown at 3 to 6 meters range
Medium Objects - Half-Action, 1d10 + Might damage, 2 meters range
Large Objects - 1 Action, 2d10 + Might damage, 1 meter range
If you roll 10 on any of those dice and the object can break, it breaks and deals an extra 1d6 damage.
~Improvised Attack~.Name: ~Improvised Attack~

~Push~.Effect: Try to push a Unit 1 meter in any direction (Might or Dexterity Check, its choice).
~Push~.Name: ~Push~

~Shift~.Effect:
You can move 1 meter without triggering attacks of oportunity.
This turn you can't move normally (and you can't use this if you already did).
~Shift~.Name: ~Shift~

~Taunt~.Effect:
Make an enemy roll a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, its next attack gains Cover (-2) if it's not on you.
~Taunt~.Name: ~Taunt~

~Action Surge~.Effect: Gain one more Half-Action this turn only.
~Action Surge~.Name: ~Action Surge~

~Aim~.Effect: After your next attack within 10 minutes, you can reroll all dice and keep the new result.
~Aim~.Notes: Applies to Abilities and buffs added to the attack, like Smite. If you decide to reroll, you have to reroll ALL of them; Smite and similar abilities must be added before the reroll.
~Aim~.Name: ~Aim~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee attack a target, the attack gains +1.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Grapple~.Effect:
You make a Might roll and the target makes a Dexterity or Might roll (its choice).
If you roll equal to or more than the enemy, the enemy becomes Grappled (Snared and Dazed).
~Grapple~.Name: ~Grapple~

~Hamstring~.Effect: A target becomes Slowed for 1 turn.
~Hamstring~.Name: ~Hamstring~

~Hide~.Effect:
When combat starts, if you have Cover from all enemies, you start as Hidden.
While Hidden, you can skip your turn.
Then, you can unhide and start your turn whenever you like (even during enemies' turns).
If you did this, when your turn ends, you are no longer hidden.
~Hide~.Notes:
Attacking or using Abilities or moving out of cover in relation to any enemy makes you unhides you.
If you don't start your turn this round, you essentially lose your turn. You don't take 2 turns next round.
If you want to start during an enemy's turn, you do so when they declare they want to do something or after they finish doing something.
In special circumstances, the DM might ask you to make a Dexterity Check to remain Hidden.
You can't become Hidden through non-Ability means.
~Hide~.Name: ~Hide~

~Lightstrike~.Effect:
Make a melee attack that deals 1d8 + 2 Force damage.
After the attack, your turn ends immediately.
~Lightstrike~.Notes: This counts as a weapon attack.
~Lightstrike~.Name: ~Lightstrike~

~Wait~.Effect:
Skip your turn and declare any number as your new initiative.
You start your turn later this Encounter at that initiative.
~Wait~.Notes: Your new initiative stays like that for later turns.
~Wait~.Name: ~Wait~

~Chilling Shout~.Effect:
Attack a target for 12 + Main Stat Cold damage (against Defense).
It becomes Slowed.
~Chilling Shout~.Name: ~Chilling Shout~

~Panic Lash~.Effect: A target within 3 meters takes 3d4 Psychic damage (directly) and can't cast Healing spells or regain Health for 1 turn.
~Panic Lash~.Name: ~Panic Lash~

~Recuperate~.Effect: Heal yourself for 1d6 and remove all Snare and Slow effects on you.
~Recuperate~.Name: ~Recuperate~

~Shank~.Effect: Make a melee attack with a 1-Handed Weapon. It has Cover (-2).
~Shank~.Name: ~Shank~

~Vault Break~.Effect: Attack and break an obstacle near you that takes at most 4 square meters area and is made of wood, rubble, shrubbery, dirt, ice, magic barrier or any similar material. After casting this Ability, if you moved this turn, you can continue your movement.
~Vault Break~.Notes: 4 square meters means either 4x1 meters or 2x2 meters. The height of the obstacle can be up to 3 meters tall, but it's up to the GM's whether you can break certain tall objects.
~Vault Break~.Name: ~Vault Break~

~Blood Foment~.Effect: A target must pass a Charisma check or take 4d6 Fire damage (or half if it succeeds) and be limited to only one attack per turn; it must make the Check again at the end of its every turn and this limit persists until it succeeds.
~Blood Foment~.Note: The damage happens only once, when you use this Ability.
~Blood Foment~.Name: ~Blood Foment~

~Aim~.Effect: After your next attack within 10 minutes, you can reroll all dice and keep the new result.
~Aim~.Notes: Applies to Abilities and buffs added to the attack, like Smite. If you decide to reroll, you have to reroll ALL of them; Smite and similar abilities must be added before the reroll.
~Aim~.Name: ~Aim~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee attack a target, the attack gains +1.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Grapple~.Effect:
You make a Might roll and the target makes a Dexterity or Might roll (its choice).
If you roll equal to or more than the enemy, the enemy becomes Grappled (Snared and Dazed).
~Grapple~.Name: ~Grapple~

~Hamstring~.Effect: A target becomes Slowed for 1 turn.
~Hamstring~.Name: ~Hamstring~

~Hide~.Effect:
When combat starts, if you have Cover, you start as Hidden.
While Hidden, you can skip your turn.
Then, you can unhide and start your turn whenever you like (even during enemies' turns).
If you did this, when your turn ends, you are no longer hidden.
~Hide~.Notes:
Essentially, you can interrupt another Unit's turn, put that unit on pause, and start your turn. When your turn ends, the Unit resumes its turn.
If you want to start during an enemy's turn, you do so when they declare they want to do something or after they finish doing something.
~Hide~.Name: ~Hide~

~Lightstrike~.Effect:
Make a melee attack that deals 1d8 + 2 Force damage.
After the attack, your turn ends immediately.
~Lightstrike~.Name: ~Lightstrike~

~Wait~.Effect:
Skip your turn and declare any number as your new initiative.
You start your turn later this Encounter at that initiative.
~Wait~.Notes: Your new initiative stays like that for later turns.
~Wait~.Name: ~Wait~

~Glory Shout~.Effect: You and all allies that can hear you are healed for 3 Health.
~Glory Shout~.Name: ~Glory Shout~

~Acid Burst~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Dexterity Check.
It takes 1d4 + Main Stat Acid damage (directly) on a failed Check, or half of that if it succeeds.
~Acid Burst~.Name: ~Acid Burst~

~Burning Breath~.Effect: All Units in a 90 degree, 3 meter cone take 3 Fire damage (directly).
~Burning Breath~.Name: ~Burning Breath~

~Bonfire~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter zone.
A bonfire errupts in that place.
Any Unit touching the bonfire takes 1d8 Fire damage (directly).
~Bonfire~.Notes: If the bonfire can spread fire to nearby flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, it spreads at the start of your next turn (same for further bonfires).
~Bonfire~.Name: ~Bonfire~

~Control Flames~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of fire.
Choose one of the following things to do with it:
- You can spread the fire up to (Your Level) meters in any direction (Your Level spaces of 1x1 meter)
- You can extinguish it
- You can double of halve the radius of light or heat it spreads
- You can change its color
- You can cause simple shapes to appear in the flicker.
You can have 2 effects active at the same time at level 1, 4 at level 4 and unlimited at level 8.
Effects last up to 1 hour.
If the fire touches a Unit, it takes 1d8 Fire damage (directly).
~Control Flames~.Notes: If you spread the fire, you can spread it in any shape - arrange the fire squares how you like.
~Control Flames~.Name: ~Control Flames~

~Control Water~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of water or ice.
Choose one of the following things to do with it:
- You can move it (Your Level) meters in any direction
- You can roughly alter its shape
- You can change its color or opacity
- You can freeze or evaporate the water.
Freezing, changing its color or shape last up to 1 hour.
The area increases to 2x2x2 meters at Level 4 and 4x4x4 meters at Level 8.
~Control Water~.Notes: The water does no damage if it touches a Unit.
~Control Water~.Name: ~Control Water~

~Control Earth~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of dirt, loose stone, sand, etc.
You can do the following things to it.
- You can move it 1 meter in any direction.
If a Unit was hit by it or it was removed from below a Unit's feet, it rolls a Dexterity Check (against your Counter Check Grade).
If it fails, it takes 1d8 damage and is knocked prone.
If a Unit is burried in dirt (or loose stone, etc) after failing the Check, it takes 1d8 additional damage (directly).
- You can roughly shape it in any form
- You can cause it to become difficult terrain.
You can do this twice per Long Rest at level 1, 4 times per Long Rest at level 4 and unlimited times at level 8.
~Control Earth~.Name: ~Control Earth~

~Fire Bolt~.Effect: Make a Spell attack that deals deal 3d6 + Main Stat Fire damage (against Defense).
~Fire Bolt~.Name: ~Fire Bolt~

~Flameblade~.Effect: You can freely change the damage of your melee weapon attacks to Fire damage.
~Flameblade~.Name: ~Flameblade~

~Frostbite~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Might Check and takes 2d8 + 2 damage (directly) if it fails, or half if it succeeds.
If it fails, it is also Slowed.
~Frostbite~.Name: ~Frostbite~

~Land Breach~.Effect:
You gather stone, dirt, sand, etc from the surroundings and release it upon an enemy.
Deal 3d6 damage Force damage to a Unit (against Defense), and two of rolled dice (you choose) to its adjacent Units (against Defense).
~Land Breach~.Name: ~Land Breach~

~Quicksand~.Effect:
Declare a 2x2 meter zone made of dirt, sand or other such material.
That zone becomes Difficult Terrain.
~Quicksand~.Variant: You can also cause this difficult terrain with vegetation.
~Quicksand~.Name: ~Quicksand~

~Thunder Clap~.Effect: Attack all Units within 1 meter for 2d8 Shock damage (against their Defense).
~Thunder Clap~.Name: ~Thunder Clap~

~Absorb Element~.Effect:
Use when you take magic damage.
You only take half of that damage, and you infuse yourself with that element.
The next time you make a single target attack, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage of the infused element.
~Absorb Element~.Name: ~Absorb Element~

~Crackling Lightning~.Duration: Until the target dies or you don't do this
~Crackling Lightning~.Effect:
When you cast this the first time, declare a target.
Every turn (including this), you can use Half-Action to attack that target for 3d6 Shock damage (against Defense).
If you don't do this on a turn, the spell ends.
~Crackling Lightning~.Name: ~Crackling Lightning~

~Frost Nova~.Effect:
All Units within 2 meters of you make a Dexterity Check.
They take 1d8 + 4 Cold damage (directly) if they fail, or half of that if they succeed.
If they fail, they are also Slowed.
~Frost Nova~.Name: ~Frost Nova~

~Frost Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on a smooth solid surface. The rune covers a 1x1 area.
Heavy physical contact with the rune detonates it, dealing 4d6 Cold damage (against Defense) to the Unit that activates it.
Also, it must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.
~Frost Rune~.Name: ~Frost Rune~

~Explosion Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on a smooth solid surface. The rune covers a 1x1 area.
You can use a free Reaction to detonate it, dealing 4d6 half Fire half Force damage (against Defense) to the Unit that activates it and all Units within 2 meters of it.
At Level 4, this lasts until your next Long Rest.
~Explosion Rune~.Notes: A free Reaction does not use up your Reaction.
~Explosion Rune~.Name: ~Explosion Rune~

~Ice Spike~.Effect:
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, it takes 4d8 Cold damage (directly), or half otherwise.
The target automatically fails if it's affected by any Crowd Control! (except Hard Terrain).
~Ice Spike~.Name: ~Ice Spike~

~Fire Enchantment~.Effect:
Touch a weapon to imbue it with Fire.
That weapon deals +2 Fire damage.
Lasts until the end of the next (or current) combat.
~Fire Enchantment~.Notes: Does not stack with other weapon enchantments from Spells.
~Fire Enchantment~.Name: ~Fire Enchantment~

~Heat Metal~.Effect:
Choose a piece of metal and heat it.
- If it's an armor, the wearer takes 2d6 + 1 Fire damage (directly).
- If it's a weapon, the wearer takes Main Stat Damage (directly) and Also, it must pass a Might Check or be Crippled.
~Heat Metal~.Name: ~Heat Metal~

~Flame Strike~.Effect:
Conjure a 5x5 zone of flames on the ground.
At the end of each of your turns, roll 1d4 + 2.
All Units inside the zone take that amount as Fire damage (directly).
~Flame Strike~.Name: ~Flame Strike~

~Scorching Rays~.Effect: Make 3 attacks. Each does 1d6 + 5 Fire damage (each vs Defense).
~Scorching Rays~.Name: ~Scorching Rays~

~Freeze Water~.Effect:
Choose a point you can see with a continuous mass of water. You begin channeling.
On every turn (until you stop channeling), the water freezes in a sphere around the point, (Your Level - 3) meters radius for each Half-Action spent.
~Freeze Water~.Name: ~Freeze Water~

~Fire Ball~.Effect: Damage all Units in a 6x6x6 cube for 6d6 Fire damage (against Defense).
~Fire Ball~.Name: ~Fire Ball~

~Water Sphere~.Effect:
Shoot a 1 meter in diameter ball of water in a direction parallel to the floor that can travel up to 9 meters.
The ball can bounce off of walls and solid objects (not Units).
The angle it bounces to is equal to the angle it was thrown from respective to the surface it bounces from (like light is reflected in a mirror in real life).
The ball bursts when it collides with a Unit, dealing 2d10 + 2 damage plus 1d10 for each time it bounced.
(Damage is dealt against Defense).
The Sphere can bounce up to 2 times.
~Water Sphere~.Name: ~Water Sphere~

~Dancing Blade~.Effect: You magically levitate your 1-Handed weapon to extend its range to 2 meters.
~Dancing Blade~.Notes: It does not count as occupying your hand.
~Dancing Blade~.Name: ~Dancing Blade~

~Magic Missiles~.Effect:
Shoot 3 missiles. Each missile does 1d4 Force damage (directly).
At Level 4, you can also spend any amount of Mana, and you shoot 2 more missiles for each Mana spent.
~Magic Missiles~.Notes: You can send missiles to different targets, but you must declare all the attacks at once.
~Magic Missiles~.Name: ~Magic Missiles~

~Prestidigitation~.Effect:
You can create harmless sensory effects.
You can create sparks and change the temperature of objects (channeled).
You can instantly clean or soil objects.
You can make symbols appear on surfaces (up to 1 hour).
You can create small, harmless illusions that fit into your hand.
You can control a quill with telekinesis to quickly write with it (1 meter range).
~Prestidigitation~.Name: ~Prestidigitation~

~Resistance~.Effect:
Touch an ally and it chooses a Stat.
It has +1d4 in all Combat Checks with that Stat.
You can only have this buff active on one person at a time.
~Resistance~.Name: ~Resistance~

~Arcane Spear~.Effect:
All Units in a 6 meter line from you make a Dexterity Check.
Deal 12 damage (directly) to all targets who failed.
If no Unit failed, you gain the Mana back.
~Arcane Spear~.Name: ~Arcane Spear~

~Flash~.Effect: Instantly teleport up to 6 meters away.
~Flash~.Notes: You take with you all items carried.
~Flash~.Name: ~Flash~

~Mage Armor~.Effect: Your total Defense (with all calculations) can't be lower than 4.
~Mage Armor~.Name: ~Mage Armor~

~Magic Nova~.Effect:
Declare a 2x2 meter area.
All Units in that are must pass a Might Check or take 8d4 Force Damage (directly), or half of that if they pass.
The blast extends 2 more meters from its edges in all directions and further damages directly all Units on this 2-meter edge for half of the damage rolled.
~Magic Nova~.Notes: To conclude, the total area of this Spell is 4x4 meters. The Units in the 2x2 center must pass the check or take full damage and the units on the edge just take half of the damage (as if they passed a Check for the center).
~Magic Nova~.Name: ~Magic Nova~

~Phase Orb~.Effect:
Pick a 1x1 zone. A magical orb is created in that place.
At the start of your next turn, the orb dashes to your position.
All Units in the orb's path take 3d4 Force damage (directly).
~Phase Orb~.Name: ~Phase Orb~

~Shield Element~.Effect:
Name 1 element from Fire/Cold/Electric and choose two allies.
The next time those allies would take that type of damage, that damage is halved.
~Shield Element~.Name: ~Shield Element~

~Antimagic Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on the ground.
You can activate it at any time and from any distance.
When you activate it, the rune creates a 5x5 meter zone.
Try to Silence all units inside (Intelligence Check) and they also take (Your Level) Force damage on detonation.
~Antimagic Rune~.Name: ~Antimagic Rune~

~Dispel Magic~.Effect: Touch an ally and dispell any ongoing or negative short-term magical effects on it. At Level 6, you can remove long-term magical effects with this as well.
~Dispel Magic~.Name: ~Dispel Magic~

~Feather Fall~.Effect:
Consume a 10 gold worth for an <Arcane Feather>.
Up to 2 Units you choose will start falling gently, down to 3 meters per round.
Once the fall finishes, the spell effect ends.
~Feather Fall~.Notes:
Arcane Feathers can be bought in most towns.
For faster gameplay, you can spend 10 gold when casting the spell, and buy the feather later.
~Feather Fall~.Name: ~Feather Fall~

~Invisibility~.Effect:
You become invisible for up to (Intelligence) minutes (at least 1).
Attacking, taking damage or casting offensive spells while invisible breaks the invisibility.
~Invisibility~.Name: ~Invisibility~

~Levitate~.Effect:
First, roll 2d100. That's how many kilograms you can levitate when you cast this.
You can levitate one object you can see that remains within 6 meters of you.
You can slowly move the object vertically, 1 meter for each 2 of your movement points spent to levitate.
If you use this on an enemy, it must fail a Might Check to be levitated, and can repeat the Check at the end of each of its turns.
A levitated Unit counts as Snared.
Losing concentration (taking damage or using any action) instantly starts slowly dropping the target and breaks the Levitate.
~Levitate~.Name: ~Levitate~

~North Star~.Effect: You conjure a magical star that always shoots North and deals 4d10 Shock damage to the first Unit hit (against Defense).
~North Star~.Notes:
You can only shoot the star towards North - without an angle.
Ask the DM which way North is (if your character knows that).
~North Star~.Name: ~North Star~

~Sense Magic~.Effect:
You can tell if there is magic within (Intelligence * 10) meters from you (at least 10 meters).
You can also tell if an object you touch is magical.
If it is a common magic item, you can tell what it does (e.g. Potions, Scrolls, etc).
~Sense Magic~.Name: ~Sense Magic~

~Slow~.Effect:
Declare a 5x5 meter area.
All Units inside it must pass an Intelligence Check or be affected by the following:
- They are Slowed
- They can only make one Attack per round (does not affect Epic Monsters)
- They can't make Reactions
- They can't be invisible
- They can't inflict Crowd Control
Lasts until the start of your next turn.
~Slow~.Name: ~Slow~

~Unlock~.Effect:
You can attempt to unlock a lock magically.
Using this counts as if you Know How to Pick Locks.
You roll a Dexterity Check for this, and you get a +2 on it.
~Unlock~.Name: ~Unlock~

~Water Walk~.Effect:
Up to 2 willing Units can walk on water as normally.
The effect ends if the Unit takes damage.
~Water Walk~.Name: ~Water Walk~

~Alarm~.Effect:
You setup an invisible 4x4x4 meter cube.
If an unknown Unit or enemy enters the cube, it alerts you mentally with a bell sound, or whatever sound you choose.
~Alarm~.Name: ~Alarm~

~Control Earth~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of dirt, loose stone, sand, etc.
You can do the following things to it.
- You can move it 1 meter in any direction.
If a Unit was hit by it or it was removed from below a Unit's feet, it rolls a Dexterity Check (against your Counter Check Grade).
If it fails, it takes 1d8 damage and is knocked prone.
If a Unit is burried in dirt (or loose stone, etc) after failing the Check, it takes 1d8 additional damage (directly).
- You can roughly shape it in any form
- You can cause it to become difficult terrain.
You can do this twice per Long Rest at level 1, 4 times per Long Rest at level 4 and unlimited times at level 8.
~Control Earth~.Name: ~Control Earth~

~Control Wind~.Effect:
You can control gusts of wind in a 6x6x6 area and do the following:
- You can create a gust of Heavy Wind (see notes)
- You can move it 3 meters in any direction
- You can create wind that makes Units fall softly
- You can stop it (this takes 0 Actions)
~Control Wind~.Notes:
Moving against Heavy Wind acts as Hard Terrain.
Projectiles fired against the Wind have Cover, and projectiles fired with the Wind gain +1.
~Control Wind~.Name: ~Control Wind~

~Cure Disease~.Effect:
Touch an ally and cure a normally curable disease from it.
At level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases.
At level 8, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases.
~Cure Disease~.Name: ~Cure Disease~

~Cure Poison~.Effect: Touch an ally and end any ongoing poison effects on it.
~Cure Poison~.Name: ~Cure Poison~

~Detect Poison and Disease~.Effect: You know if there is any poison (or poisonous Unit) or disease (or ill person) within 6 meters.
~Detect Poison and Disease~.Name: ~Detect Poison and Disease~

~Flaming Arrows~.Effect: When you declare a ranged weapon attack (before rolling), you can make the attack deal Fire damage (instead of physical).
~Flaming Arrows~.Name: ~Flaming Arrows~

~Purify Food and Drink~.Effect:
Food you touch becomes clean of microbes and mild poison.
A water containter you touch (up to 2 liters per cast) becomes drinkable, clean and free of microbes and mild poison.
~Purify Food and Drink~.Name: ~Purify Food and Drink~

~Poison Burst~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Might Check.
It takes 1d6 + 2 Poison damage (directly) if it fails, or half of that if it succeeds.
~Poison Burst~.Name: ~Poison Burst~

~Resistance~.Effect:
Touch an ally and it chooses a Stat.
It has +1d4 in all Combat Checks with that Stat.
You can only have this buff active on one person at a time.
~Resistance~.Name: ~Resistance~

~Barkskin~.Effect:
That ally becomes Snared in the ground for up to 1 minute.
While rooted, that ally's Defense can't be lower than 6.
~Barkskin~.Notes: You can cancel this effect at any point at will.
~Barkskin~.Name: ~Barkskin~

~Lightning Storm~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4x4 area.
All units inside the area take 6d4 Shock damage (against Defense).
If a unit carries anything made of metal, this ignores all its Defense.
On your turn (for up to 1 minute), you can spend 1 Action to move the storm up to 3 meters and its deal damage again.
Lasts up to 1 minute.
~Lightning Storm~.Name: ~Lightning Storm~

~Wild Heart~.Effect: Up to 2 allies you touch gain Your Main Stat maximum (and current) Health and +1 to all Checks until their next Long Rest.
~Wild Heart~.Notes: The bonus to Health and Checks doesn't stack with itself, and the bonus to Checks doesn't stack with other Check buffs.
~Wild Heart~.Name: ~Wild Heart~

~Spider Climb~.Effect:
Your hands and feet can stick to solid, (more or less) flat surfaces, so you can walk on them.
Walking on walls and floors acts as Hard Terrain.
~Spider Climb~.Name: ~Spider Climb~

~Conjure Ammo~.Effect: You can conjure up to 10 arrows, bolts or bullets, javelins, throwing knives, etc.
~Conjure Ammo~.Notes: If you have this, you can just say you keep X amount of conjured ammo always ready, to speed the game up and not constantly interrupt the game.
~Conjure Ammo~.Name: ~Conjure Ammo~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 6 meters radius (30 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Alarm~.Effect:
You setup an invisible 4x4x4 meter cube.
If an unknown Unit or enemy enters the cube, it alerts you mentally with a bell sound, or whatever sound you choose.
~Alarm~.Name: ~Alarm~

~Chaining Grasp~.Effect:
Extend a magical chain to a medium (or larger) living or undead Unit and pull yourself to the target instantly.
The target also takes 1d6 True damage (directly).
~Chaining Grasp~.Name: ~Chaining Grasp~

~Dancing Weapon~.Effect:
You conjure a levitating, self-wielding melee weapon.
On your turn, the weapon can make a melee Spell Attack which deals 2d8 Force damage (against Defense).
You can also move it up to 3 meters every turn.
~Dancing Weapon~.Notes:
The weapon has no special effect, it has 8 Defense and 10 Health.
The weapon disappears if it moves more than 20 meters away from you.
It can make Opportunity Attacks, but it uses your Reaction.
~Dancing Weapon~.Name: ~Dancing Weapon~

~Distort Vision~.Effect:
This incantation distorts the visual space in an area with a diameter equal to your Level.
Make a Deception check for this, and add your Intelligence to the roll.
While keeping the distorsion, you must maintain concentration.
You lose concentration if you take damage or become crowd controlled.
~Distort Vision~.Name: ~Distort Vision~

~Eldritch Steed~.Effect:
You summon a ridable animal which doubles your movement speed on land.
The animal takes either a spectral, demonic or skeletal form.
It follows the normal rules for Riding.
It does not participate in combat.
At Level 8 the Steed can fly.
~Eldritch Steed~.Name: ~Eldritch Steed~

~Fairy Fire~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4x4 meter zone.
All Units in that zone make a Dexterity Check with Disadvantage.
If they fail, they become outlined in a colored glow (you choose the color).
Those Units can't benefit from normal Cover.
The Units glow even through walls, but the denser the walls, the less they appear to glow.
A 1-meter thick concrete wall completely blocks the glow.
~Fairy Fire~.Name: ~Fairy Fire~

~Fake Sound~.Effect:
You create a sound out of thin air.
Roll a Charisma Check and add your Intelligence modifier to it to see how accurate your sound is.
~Fake Sound~.Scaling: At Level 4, this lasts up to 1 minute. At level 8, this lasts up to 1 hour.
~Fake Sound~.Name: ~Fake Sound~

~Fog Cloud~.Effect:
A 5x5x5 meter cube of fog forms.
All Units inside the fog benefit from Cover (-2), as well as Units outside the fog attacked by one inside the fog.
You can choose the color of the fog.
The fog spreads around corners.
~Fog Cloud~.Name: ~Fog Cloud~

~Force Wall~.Effect:
You create a 3x3 meter transparent, magical and thin force wall.
Units behind the wall benefit from Hard Cover (-4 to attacks against them through the wall).
~Force Wall~.Name: ~Force Wall~

~Conjure Object~.Effect:
You can conjure an object that is up to 1x1x1 meter in size.
The object is solid and glows faintly.
You can't conjure mechanical objects.
The object disappears after 1 hour (24 hours at Level 8).
~Conjure Object~.Name: ~Conjure Object~

~Mage Hand~.Effect:
Conjure a spectral hand in a place you can see.
You can move the hand as you move your normal hands and instead of spending movement points to move yourself, you can move your hand the same distance.
The hand can't attack and disappears if it goes outside a 12 meters range.
~Mage Hand~.Name: ~Mage Hand~

~Magic Prison~.Effect:
You create a 4x4x4 meter cube.
Choose a Unit inside the cube.
It makes an Intelligence Check with triple disadvantage.
If it fails, it can not exit the cube for 24 hours.
It can make this Check to try to escape every 24 hours.
You can cast this once per day per Mana.
~Magic Prison~.Name: ~Magic Prison~

~Web~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4 meter zone
The zone becomes filled with spider web and counts as Difficult Terrain.
If a Unit exits the zone, Also, it must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.
~Web~.Name: ~Web~

~Shadow Clone~.Effect:
You create an illusion of yourself at a target location.
The illusion has 1 Health and 1 Armor and it fails all Checks.
You can control what the illusion does at will.
~Shadow Clone~.Name: ~Shadow Clone~

~Animate Dead~.Effect:
Raise an undead Unit to fight for you from a nearby medium or larger corpse. The corpse is then consumed.
The undead Unit always has Medium size, 10 Maximum Health and 3 Defense.
It has Checks equal to yours, but -2 to all skill checks.
It has 4 meters movement speed.
It can use 1 Action to attack and deals 2d4 + 1 damage if it hits (Smash, Slash or Pierce, your choice).
Your undead takes its turn immediately before or after your turn (you choose).
The undead will always try to move to and attack the closest enemy to it (you choose if it's a tie).
You can use Half-Action on your turn to command (one of) your undead to move to a certain location.
~Animate Dead~.Name: ~Animate Dead~

~Polymorph~.Effect:
Choose an animal from the Pet List or any critter, such as a sheep, deer, etc.
A Unit within 10 meters must pass an Intelligence Check or be transformed into that animal.
At the end of its every turn, it must pass the Check again or remain Polymorphed.
The unit retains its Health and Defense, but can't do any non-animal actions.
~Polymorph~.Name: ~Polymorph~

~Transmogrification~.Effect:
Touch 2 objects of the same type (e.g. 2 helmets, or 2 arrows, or 2 melee 1-handed weapons, etc).
You make one of the look like the other.
The change is permanent until the object breaks.
~Transmogrification~.Notes: Upon close inspection of the shape and colors, this is visibly an illusion.
~Transmogrification~.Name: ~Transmogrification~

~Watcher Eye~.Effect:
You conjure a magical eye that records everything it sees for up to 24 hours.
After 24 hours, the eye stops recording.
You can use your magic to scan what the eye recorded in your mind.
At any point, you can tune into the eye and see what it sees in your mind.
At level 6, you can move use your movement to instead move the Eye while you're tuned into it (it can fly).
~Watcher Eye~.Name: ~Watcher Eye~

~Portal~.Effect:
You need a partner who can cast Portal to cast this.
You both cast it at the same time, in different locations.
At the end of the cast time, a portal opens at the locations of the two casters.
Stepping through one of the portals (obviously) teleports the Unit to the other portal.
You can only cast this every 30 days.
~Portal~.Name: ~Portal~

Mysticism.Description:
Mysticism is the art of scrying and affecting the mind. Often mystics use these spells to gain information or hinder foes in combat. Some call mysticism the art of psyonics, others call it "being lucky" (which is a form of magic too, luck).
All Abilities in this List are considered Spells and are affected by Silence effects (see Crowd Control).

~Guidance~.Effect: When an ally makes a Check, it can use your modifier instead of its own.
~Guidance~.Name: ~Guidance~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 6 meters radius (30 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mastery~.Effect: You can use Wisdom or Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity for weapon attacks (you still need to be Trained in that weapon to use it properly).
~Mastery~.Notes: Also called Soelluelegh, or however it's spelled.
~Mastery~.Name: ~Mastery~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Speak With Animals~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, non-hostile animals.
~Speak With Animals~.Notes: Keep in mind that animals generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Animals~.Name: ~Speak With Animals~

~Speak With Plants~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, large plants.
~Speak With Plants~.Notes: Keep in mind that plants generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Plants~.Name: ~Speak With Plants~

~Mind Blast~.Effect:
A Unit must pass a Wisdom Check or take 3d6 + 1 Psychic damage and become Crippled or Silenced (your choice).
It takes half damage if it passes.
After you cast Mind Blast on a Unit, it becomes completely immune to Mind Blast for 1 day.
~Mind Blast~.Name: ~Mind Blast~

~Confusion~.Effect:
Deal 1d8 Psychich damage to a Unit.
Then, it must pass a Wisdom Check, otherwise roll 1d4 and the target must do one of the 4 options below on its next turn, depending on the number rolled on the d4:
1. Moves in a random direction with all of its movement (chosen by the DM) and forgets to use its Action
2. Forgets to move and can only use Half-Action
3. Forgets to move and can't do weapon attacks
4. Falls Prone and tries to make a ranged attack
~Confusion~.Name: ~Confusion~

~Charming Word~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, all your Charisma checks for/against it have +2.
Lasts until the Unit can't see or hear you anymore.
~Charming Word~.Notes: The target can't tell it was affected unless it knows about this type of magic.
~Charming Word~.Name: ~Charming Word~

~Encode Thoughts~.Effect:
You pull a String of Memory or Thoughts (can be visual, auditive, sensory and olphactive) from your own memory.
This String can be up to 1 minute in length.
It is visible to the eye as an arcane ribbon-like energy.
You can transport this String like you would carry a normal 10x10x10 decimeter object.
To view the String, a person can willingly absorb it through the mouth, eyes, nose, etc (corresponding to the type of memories) and visualize the String.
After that, the String disappears.
Encoding another String makes the previous String disappear.
~Encode Thoughts~.Name: ~Encode Thoughts~

~Influence Beast~.Effect:
A non-legendary beast that can see you makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, you can change the beast's mood (make it hungry, afraid, nervous, etc).
~Influence Beast~.Name: ~Influence Beast~

~Translation~.Effect: You can understand any spoken or written Common and Wild language.
~Translation~.Name: ~Translation~

~Watcher Eye~.Effect:
You conjure a magical eye that records everything it sees for up to 24 hours.
After 24 hours, the eye stops recording.
You can use your magic to scan what the eye recorded in your mind.
At any point, you can tune into the eye and see what it sees in your mind.
At level 6, you can move use your movement to instead move the Eye while you're tuned into it (it can fly).
~Watcher Eye~.Name: ~Watcher Eye~

~Wild Steed~.Effect:
You call upon a ridable land animal native to the zone you are in.
You and up to 1 more party member can ride this animal.
It follows the normal rules for Riding.
It does not participate in combat.
At Level 8, this can be a flying animal.
~Wild Steed~.Name: ~Wild Steed~

~Decaying Blight~.Effect:
Channel to spawn a blight that spreads 1 meter in all direction for each 1 Action channeled.
The blight kills small plants, insects and rots wood and rusts metal. It also makes fertile soil infertile, turns textile and paper materials into dust and decays food and poisons water.
You can channel a number of times (Actions) equal to your Level.
At Level 4, you can choose to ommit some of the effects of this blight.
~Decaying Blight~.Notes:
This Ability is not meant for combat.
Be creative with how you use this little spell!
~Decaying Blight~.Name: ~Decaying Blight~

~Disenchantment~.Duration: 8 hours (24 hours at level 4, 1 week at level 8)
~Disenchantment~.Effect:
A humanoid makes a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, it becomes afflicted with a minor non-combat curse, such as:
- The target can't properly tie knots, sew, use keys or pick locks, etc
- The target appears less attractive (its Charisma Skill checks have -3)
- Gains runny nose, eyes and sweats more
- Stumbles randomly
~Disenchantment~.Name: ~Disenchantment~

~Eldritch Blast~.Effect:
Make a Spell attack for 2d8 + Main Stat Force damage (against Defense).
If you roll maximum on at least one die, deal another 1d8 damage.
~Eldritch Blast~.Name: ~Eldritch Blast~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect: Make a spell attack that deal 2d12 Necrotic damage (against Defense) and the target is unable to reagain health until the end of its next turn.
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Thaumaturgy~.Effect:
You create one of the following magical effects:
- Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
- You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
- You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
- You cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
- You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.
At level 5 you can cast this for Half-Action, and at Level 9, for 0 Actions.
~Thaumaturgy~.Name: ~Thaumaturgy~

~Curse of Pain~.Effect:
Declare a target.
Whenever it makes an attack, it takes 4 Psychic damage (directly).
~Curse of Pain~.Name: ~Curse of Pain~

~Curse of Weakness~.Effect:
A target makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, whenever it makes an attack roll or Check, it rolls 1d4 and subtracts it from the result.
~Curse of Weakness~.Name: ~Curse of Weakness~

~Deathfire Bolt~.Effect:
Make a spell attack (against Defense) that deals 1d10 + 1d8 + 1d6 + Main Stat damage, Fire or Necrotic (you choose).
If the target has more than 4 Defense, deals 2 more damage for each point of Defense over 4.
~Deathfire Bolt~.Name: ~Deathfire Bolt~

~Animate Dead~.Effect:
Raise an undead Unit to fight for you from a nearby medium or larger corpse. The corpse is then consumed.
The undead Unit always has Medium size, 10 Maximum Health and 3 Defense.
It has Checks equal to yours, but -2 to all skill checks.
It has 4 meters movement speed.
It can use 1 Action to attack and deals 2d4 + 1 damage if it hits (Smash, Slash or Pierce, your choice).
Your undead takes its turn immediately before or after your turn (you choose).
The undead will always try to move to and attack the closest enemy to it (you choose if it's a tie).
You can use Half-Action on your turn to command (one of) your undead to move to a certain location.
~Animate Dead~.Name: ~Animate Dead~

~Spare the Dying~.Effect:
Touch a Unit that died at most 10 minutes ago or an unconscious Unit.
If the Unit is dead, and if the Unit's body is fairly intact, the dead Unit comes back to life, stabilized and unconscious.
If the Unit is unconscious, the Unit wakes up and is healed for 1 Health.
~Spare the Dying~.Name: ~Spare the Dying~

~Cure Disease~.Effect:
Touch an ally and cure a normally curable disease from it.
At level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases.
At level 8, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases.
~Cure Disease~.Name: ~Cure Disease~

~Cure Poison~.Effect: Touch an ally and end any ongoing poison effects on it.
~Cure Poison~.Name: ~Cure Poison~

~Detect Poison and Disease~.Effect: You know if there is any poison (or poisonous Unit) or disease (or ill person) within 6 meters.
~Detect Poison and Disease~.Name: ~Detect Poison and Disease~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 6 meters radius (30 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Purify Food and Drink~.Effect:
Food you touch becomes clean of microbes and mild poison.
A water containter you touch (up to 2 liters per cast) becomes drinkable, clean and free of microbes and mild poison.
~Purify Food and Drink~.Name: ~Purify Food and Drink~

~Blinding Smite~.Effect:
After you make a melee attack that did damage, all enemies within 2 meters of the target make a Dexterity Check.
If they fail, they are Blinded for 1 turn.
~Blinding Smite~.Name: ~Blinding Smite~

~Cleansing Flames~.Effect: Deal 1d4 + 1 Fire damage (directly) and remove all buffs and debuffs from the target.
~Cleansing Flames~.Name: ~Cleansing Flames~

~Cleansing Smite~.Effect: After you land a melee attack that did damage, deal 1d6 True damage (directly) to the target and heal yourself for 1d10.
~Cleansing Smite~.Name: ~Cleansing Smite~

~Cure Wounds~.Effect: Touch an ally and heal it for 2d4 + Main Stat.
~Cure Wounds~.Name: ~Cure Wounds~

~Radiant Smite~.Effect: After you make a melee attack that did damage, deal 1d8 True damage (directly) to the target and all enemies within 6 meters of target.
~Radiant Smite~.Name: ~Radiant Smite~

~Restful Soothing~.Effect: Restore up to 3d6 Health spread out as you like among your party members.
~Restful Soothing~.Note: You must be staying in place to channel this. You can't heal yourself with this.
~Restful Soothing~.Name: ~Restful Soothing~

~Turn Undead~.Effect:
All enemy Undead you can see within 6 meters make a Wisdom Check.
If any fails, it is Feared.
~Turn Undead~.Name: ~Turn Undead~

~Rise~.Effect:
Heal a Fallen Unit to 20% of it total Health.
It does not suffer of Exhaustion from rising after being Fallen.
~Rise~.Name: ~Rise~

~Spare the Dying~.Effect:
Touch a Unit that died at most 2 hours ago or an unconscious Unit.
If the Unit is dead, and if the Unit's body is fairly intact, the dead Unit comes back to life, stabilized and unconscious.
If the Unit is unconscious, the Unit wakes up and is healed for 1 Health.
~Spare the Dying~.Name: ~Spare the Dying~

~Wraithwalk~.Effect:
You become spectral for 10 seconds (until the start of your next turn).
While spectral, you can move through walls, objects and Units, but not through floors and ceilings.
If the effect doesn't end in an empty space, you are instantly thrown to the nearest empty space and you take 3d4 Force damage (directly).
~Wraithwalk~.Name: ~Wraithwalk~

~Cure Disease~.Effect:
Touch an ally and cure a normally curable disease from it.
At level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases.
At level 8, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases.
~Cure Disease~.Name: ~Cure Disease~

~Cure Poison~.Effect: Touch an ally and end any ongoing poison effects on it.
~Cure Poison~.Name: ~Cure Poison~

~Detect Poison and Disease~.Effect: You know if there is any poison (or poisonous Unit) or disease (or ill person) within 6 meters.
~Detect Poison and Disease~.Name: ~Detect Poison and Disease~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect: Make a spell attack that deal 2d12 Necrotic damage (against Defense) and the target is unable to reagain health until the end of its next turn.
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Flameblade~.Effect: You can freely change the damage of your melee weapon attacks to Fire damage.
~Flameblade~.Name: ~Flameblade~

~Flaming Arrows~.Effect: When you declare a ranged weapon attack (before rolling), you can make the attack deal Fire damage (instead of physical).
~Flaming Arrows~.Name: ~Flaming Arrows~

~Purify Food and Drink~.Effect:
Food you touch becomes clean of microbes and mild poison.
A water containter you touch (up to 2 liters per cast) becomes drinkable, clean and free of microbes and mild poison.
~Purify Food and Drink~.Name: ~Purify Food and Drink~

~Water Walk~.Effect:
Up to 2 willing Units can walk on water as normally.
The effect ends if the Unit takes damage.
~Water Walk~.Name: ~Water Walk~

~Invigorate~.Effect:
Heal a target for 1d4 + 2 Health.
If after this the target is at full Health, repeat this on another target.
~Invigorate~.Name: ~Invigorate~

~Searing Smite~.Effect: Add 1d8 Fire damage to a weapon Attack. The target takes another 1d8 Fire damage at the start of your next turn.
~Searing Smite~.Name: ~Searing Smite~

~Vindication~.Effect:
Choose a target.
For every 20% of its missing Health, heal it for your Main Stat Health.
~Vindication~.Name: ~Vindication~

~Restoration~.Effect: Remove all your party members' Exhaustion from rising after being Fallen, from not sleeping and from magical effects.
~Restoration~.Name: ~Restoration~
